pageContext.claim: “You had interviews -- one of the folks that was, perhaps, in this room -- I think might be in this room -- said, "What was your crime?" And the man said, "Murder." And the reporter looks at -- "Murder?" That's a very famous clip. She said, "Well, what was your crime?" You know, they were interviewing to show how wonderful the people are in the caravan.”
pageContext.analysis: The migrant said he was traveling to the U.S. to ask for asylum and had been previously charged with attempted murder.
